params.seller: The service provider who will receive payment
params.sellerAgentId: The seller's agent ID for reputation tracking

returns.escrowId: The ID of the created escrow

refund(uint256).details: AUDIT FIX: Added nonReentrant modifier and existence check

release(uint256).details: AUDIT FIX: Added nonReentrant modifier and existence check

createEscrow(address,bytes32,uint256).notice: Create a new escrow by locking USDC

dispute(uint256).notice: Mark escrow as disputed (for future arbitration)

refund(uint256).notice: Refund to buyer after deadline (task not completed)

release(uint256).notice: Buyer releases funds to seller (task completed)

setAgentRegistry(address).notice: Set the AgentRegistry for reputation tracking
